sources.title: Sex with the Stars (1981)
sources.description: After his magazine is bought, an astrology writer is tasked with sleeping with women from each zodiac sign and documenting the encounters before a deadline, gaining confidence as he progresses through the signs.

metadata.Plot: After the magazine he works for is taken over by a sex-obsessed American, a shy astrology columnist is ordered to spice up his column by writing about having sex with a woman from each star sign. Unsure of himself at first, he begins gaining confidence after a few successes, but he still has to rush to complete all 12 columns before his deadline.
metadata.Actors: Martin Burrows, Thick Wilson, Janet Love
